###
### Fast Levelling: Insane Variant (very cheaty!)
###
### I wanted a way to quickly level a character up for testing purposes
### so that's what this mod provides.  Increases XP gains by 500x.
###
### Generated by gen_fast_levelling.py
###

prefix: FastLevellingInsane

# Base XP Scaling
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/Experience/Att_BaseEnemyExperience.Att_BaseEnemyExperience:ValueResolver_PlayThroughDefinedAttributeValueResolver,Value.PlaythroughOne.BaseValueConstant,0,,5000
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/Experience/Att_BaseEnemyExperience.Att_BaseEnemyExperience:ValueResolver_PlayThroughDefinedAttributeValueResolver,Value.PlaythroughTwoAndBeyond.BaseValueConstant,0,,5000

# Remove XP Scaling by level differences
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[0].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[0].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[1].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[1].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[2].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[2].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[3].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[3].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[4].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[4].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[5].HigherLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Balance/ExperienceGlobals.ExperienceGlobals,ExpScaleByLevelDifference.ExpScaleByLevelDifference[5].LowerLevelEnemyExpScale,0,,1
